articles.description: Congress is likely to announce the first list of candidates for Gujarat elections on Sunday when a meeting is scheduled with PAAS leaders.
articles.title: Gujarat elections: Factionalism, Patidar hardball delay Congress list

articles.description: The release of Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s Padmavati has been deferred. The film has been in the eye of storm for allegedly distorting history and presenting the queen in a poor...
articles.title: Padmavati release deferred after protests, Sanjay Leela Bhansali film not to come out on Dec 1

articles.description: The 93-year-old Robert Mugabe has been under house arrest since Tuesday, when the military moved in.
articles.title: After 37 years, Zimbabwe’s Robert Mugabe fired as ruling party leader
